page.title: 16Education _ School books
page.content: In our class we have our own favorite books but the favourite is the B.F.G. which stands for the Big friendly giant.It is a very good book with funny parts in it. One day the B.F.G. ate this peculiar green thing called a snozcumber and took a bite of it and spit it back out because he didnt like it. The writer was Roald Dahl he writes hundreads of books. There are other writers like Enid Blyton she wrote all the famous five books and other fourite books. The order of the best author in first place Roald Dahl in second place C.S. Lewis in third place Pat Hutchins.
